title: What is the best way to prepare yourself one year prior to applying for the United States Air Force? - Quora

response.answer_text: Get into good physical shape and read up on the AF. ASVAB Study Guide 2018-2019: Test Prep & Practice Test Questions for the Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery Exam by Test Prep Books Military Team (if you have not taken it) There used to be an AF Enlisted Guide but I cannot find it.
Learn to sit down for extended periods of time.
